title: MD
biography: Arjun Singh was an Indian politician from the Indian National Congress, who served twice as the Chief Minister of Madhya Pradesh in the 1980s. He also served twice as the Union Minister of Human Resource Development, in the Manmohan Singh and P. V. Narasimha Rao ministries.
aiSummary: Arjun Singh is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 61 at GI Oncology (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Global Health, The Lancet Oncology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
